Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Many brands strive to list the lowest possible weight, but in reality weight can vary based on size, finish, hardware and accessories. All our bikes are designed for best-in-class weight and ride quality.We Deliver Nationwide! title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. title: Scott, Aspect, 29 inch, Hardtail Mountain Bike
text: This is a Scott, 930 Aspect, 29-inch hardtail race machine in excellent condition. Alloy hardtails continue to be the best selling bicycles ever and there is a reason why. Compared to full-suspension mountain bikes, hardtails are easier to maintain, lightweight, which makes them faster, simple, and more responsive. This makes them very appealing to many riders.- Affordable price!- Hydraulic disc brakes.- 30-speeds.- Comfortable saddle.- Good for every terrain.- Very smooth shifting.- Lightweight Alloy, especially for the price.- 29" wheels great at soaking up rough terrain.

title: Trek Roscoe 24"
text:
Roscoe 24 is a kids' mountain bike designed to build confidence on the trail. It takes cues from the adult Roscoe, but this ride was built from the ground up for kids. 2.8˝ mid-fat tires, a 1x drivetrain, and a wide-range cassette make Roscoe the ideal bike for little rippers who want to build skills and have a ridiculous amount of fun keeping up with Mom, Dad, or an older sibling. Fit for riders 51-59˝tall.

2021 model retails for R9000.

text:
Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet in excellent like new condition, used only a few times. Neat, barely any signs of use.

This helmet retails at over R2.5k!

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

title: Thule ClipOn3 *LIKE NEW*
text:
Retails for R3000+ at major retailer, you can get it in almost new condition for only R2000.

Thule's Clip On 9104 Bike Rack ia an easy-to-use, hanging-style trunk bike rack designed for station wagons and hatchbacks and will store 3 bikes with relative ease. It is easily mountable due to Thule's unique snap-on system and the rubber coated components ensure that your bike and car paint will not be damaged by this bike rack in any way.

Key Features:
- All parts in contact with the car and bikes are coated with rubber for extra protection.
- Easy to mount to the rear door with a unique snap-on system.
- Quickly folds for easy storage.
- Possible to attach Thule Light board 976.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 982 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies’ bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes)
- This product does not have universal fit and it comes in two versions (9103 and 9104) having different tube diameters fitting different car models
- Max load capacity is 45kg with each bike weighing in at a maximum of 15kg each
- Dimensions(cm): 57 x 82 x 116 (Folded: 57 x 18 x 117)
- Weight: 7.1kg

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: Iglide hoverboard for sale
text:
Very good condition hoverboard for sale. 

The New V3 Off-Road Hoveboard
Can be used on or off-road
Has10 Inch inflatable wheels.
Is more rugged than the V1.
Has LED lights at the front and back.
 

Safe To Use
Requiring no experience to operate, we’ve added increased safety elements to ensure stable driving conditions. Our smart battery management system is made from the highest quality components to prevent unnecessary incidents - cutting power to the system as soon as control is lost.

Added Bluetooth element
You no longer have to leave your beats behind when taking a ride on your Hoverboards. You can now track along with your tunes with our new Bluetooth element added to our two-wheel self-balancing V3 iGlide.

Extremely convenient
Due to its light weight, the V3 iGlide is convenient to take with you wherever you may need to go. Not only is it dustproof, the V3 Hoverboard is easily manoeuvrable around sharp bends and turns – making it durable, strong and easy to operate.

 

Specifications

Minimum Weight of Rider	30 KG
Maximum Weight	130 kg
Maximum cruising speed	15-20 km/h
Maximum Mileage (after full charge)	15-20 km (Depending on terrains; weight of rider) 
Maximum climbing angles	35 degrees
Power	750-800 watts
Battery	Li-ion battery 36V, 4.4AH
Working temperature	10°-50°
Storage temperature	-20°-50°
Charging temperature	-15°-50°
The use of temperature	-15°-50°
Charging time	3-6 hours
Lights	Yes
Charging requirements	100 V -240V 50/60HZ
Motor power	350w*2
Dimension	660*270*270mm
Pedal height	270mm
Tire size	255mm
Chassis clearance	70mm
T&C's	
IMPORTANT: Just in case your newly purchased product needs to be serviced or returned, please keep the original packaging materials and original receipt. Damage to a Product returned to EBO for service or return due to inadequate packaging will void your warranty or return/exchange acceptance. This product is not waterproof.Please keep the Hoverboard on the floor at all times when switched on and do not lift. Not Waterproof as this a an electrical product. 
 
Certification	CE & ROHS & FCC
Tire Pressure (Inflatable Tyre)	1.8 Bar
Includes	Hoverboard ; Charger
Bluetooth	Enabling Bluetooth:
Switch the Hoverboard on (the hoverboard must stay on throughout the connection process.)
Go into the Bluetooth settings on your Bluetooth device (Cell phone Android/IOS)
Search for devices
The hoverboard connection should then appear on your device as a new device.
Click on the hoverboard to start connection.
As soon as it is connected it will appear on your device
You can now try to play music from your Music playlist and the sound will reflect upon the hoverboard.
1 Built-In Bluetooth Speaker

Product Weight	13 Kg
Terrains of Use	
All Terrain Hoverboard - In-Doors ; Grass ; Dry Sand ; Gravel ; Bricked Paving ; Tar etc

title: Specialized Chisel - 29er - Size Large
text:
** Please read the Full Add

 

Limited Stock in the World of Cycling has brought the
industry to its proverbial knees.

 

Here we have on offer a near spotless example of what a well
looked after hard tail should look like. Almost perfect except for two marks -
one on the crank arm one on the fork.

 

The bike was bought New in November 2020 (Invoice is
available) and the factory fork was replaced with a Rockshox 2020 SID 35 SL
Select Debon Air 100 with Tapered Boost Twistloc at an additional cost of +-
R12 900 (invoice available)

 

The bike is being sold without the pedals and bottle cages
as featured in the photos. This is a rare find, in near perfect condition and a
must see for those wanting to get into the sport.

 

Review below:

 

The all-new Chisel Comp is the perfect bike to begin your
journey into XC riding and racing, with all of the features to get you to that
elusive "top step" at a price that leaves some jingle jangle left
over for race entries.

 

This Chisel comes dressed with Shimano's crisp-shifting SLX
1x12 drivetrain and powerful M6100 hydraulic disc brakes. The Chisel's all-new
frame utilizes our D'Aluisio Smartweld technology that moves the hydroformed
tube joints away from the areas of the highest stress, making the finished
frame's balance of strength, rigidity, and weight more pronounced than any
alloy frame in history. This not only makes the Chisel one of the lightest
alloy hardtail frames coming in as light as 1,400g, but it also allows for
tuned frame stiffness across all sizes.

 

The new Chisel also houses all of the modern features that
you expect from an XC bike, like Progressive XC Geometry with a 68-degree headtube
angle and longer reach, internal cable routing, a threaded bottom bracket,
boost spacing, 30.9mm dropper post compatibility, and 1x-only drivetrains.

 

Price is reflective of condition and cost of the replacement
fork.

 

Selling on behalf of Bother

 

Asking R35 000

title: Ryder Bora 2.0 UK9 + MTB Shimano Pedals + Cleates
text:
Retails for R1800 at Cyclelab. You can get it for half price with a free set of used MTB Pedals.

The Ryder Bora 2.0 MTB Cycling Shoe offers the comfort and quick adjustment provided by a A-Top dial. With a single dial and a set-and-forget front strap, it should be convenient for the rider to be able to slip on this shoe and hit the trails. The A-top dial offers 1mm adjustment increments when tightening with macro release function. The co-moulded nylon and rubber lugged outsole provides high traction and durability to this shoe, ensuring that it will be suitable for varying terrains.

Features:

- Rigid MTB sole to protect the rider and increase power transfer from the rider to the pedals
- A-top fastening system for an adjustable, custom fit
- Breathable mesh to keep the rider cool
- Rubber non-slip heel lining to increase the stability of the rider

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.
